editor_palette_item.body:
<g transform="translate(%%COORDINATE_X%%,%%COORDINATE_Y%%)" id="button_ok"> <!-- Metadata information. Please don't edit. --> <text display="none">type=button</text>
<rect x="-2" y="-2" rx="5" ry="5" width="80" height="30" fill="white"/> <rect x="1" y="1" rx="5" ry="5" width="81" height="31" fill="rgb(0,0,128)"/> <g> <text display="none">type=body</text> <rect transform="matrix(1.060988,0.003826782,-0.003826782,1.060988,4.617886,1.9321077)" x="0" y="0" rx="5" ry="5" width="80" height="30" fill="rgb(176,196,222)" stroke="rgb(255,165,0)" stroke-width="0"> <animate attributeName="stroke-width" attributeType="XML" begin="button_ok.focusin" dur="0.25s" fill="freeze" to="2"/> <animate attributeName="stroke-width" attributeType="XML" begin="button_ok.focusout" dur="0.25s" fill="freeze" to="0"/> <!-- The third and fourth animation elements are used for animate button : on press, on release --> <animate attributeName="fill" attributeType="XML" begin="indefinite" dur="0.25s" fill="freeze" to="rgb(156,176,202)"/> <animate attributeName="fill" attributeType="XML" begin="indefinite" dur="0.25s" fill="freeze" to="rgb(176,196,222)"/> </rect> </g> <text x="24" y="23" fill="black" font-size="20"> <text display="none">type=shadow_text</text> OK</text> <text x="23" y="21" fill="gray" font-size="20"> <text display="none">type=text</text> OK</text> </g>
